flawed_nl_solution:
Kaiden collects 158 cans his first week and 259 cans during the second week. 158 + 259 = <<158+259=147>>147 cans of soup
Kaiden wants to collect a total of 500 cans, so he still needs 500 - 147 = <<500-147=353>>353 cans of soup
#### 353

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 417, not 147. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
